title: Factions Friday at Five (July 24)

embed.description: Factions Friday matches begin at 5:00 Pacific time. To get in on a match, join the Factions chat in-client, and also join your faction's chat. If you're new to Factions, you may find the Beginners' Guide helpful. When you're ready, you can sign up for a faction here.

body:
https://leaguefactions.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/the-mushroom-wizard-arc-vii-banner-lines-in-the-sand.png

**[Factions](http://LeagueFactions.net)** matches today starting at 5:00 Pacific. Factions matches can happen anytime, but we started Factions Friday to help new people get started.

http://leaguefactions.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/joinchatbutton-marked.jpg

Our in-client chat room is "Factions". Once you've **[chosen your faction for this arc](http://leaguefactions.net/factions-sign-up/)**, you should also join your faction's specific chat (e.g. "Noxus"). This makes it easier for people who are organizing matches to find you.

replies.body: Just remember: No matter what anyone else says; Noxus is the best.
if u couldnt tell by my name im in the middle :o

Be sure to ask around for any questions you may have!

And don't forget that Noxus and Piltover get a single ban against Shurima!
